name: Azur the Eater - Scuffed Wars
description:
Follow One and Zero's attempts to escape from the evil Darth Paternitus!

WASD to move, Left Click to shoot

If you really don't wanna sit through the opening intro just hold LShift to speed it up or ESC to skip it entirely

Progress through all 3 levels to reach the final victory screen! :)

P.S.Keep an eye out for the secret ending ;)
